text:
Bertha Elba Sanseverino Mansilla (April 25, 1946 – June 18, 2018) was a Uruguayan politician. She was a member of the Broad Front ("Frente Amplio") from 1971 until her death and the Liber Seregni Front section of the Uruguay Assembly. Sanseverino was a member of the Departmental Board of Montevideo for two terms from 1995 until 2004.
In 2010, she was elected to the national Chamber of Representatives of Uruguay, where she worked until her death in office in June 2018.
